title: Rahowa! This Planet Is All Ours!
description: In 1983, Ben Klassen launched "Racial Loyalty," the monthly publication of his organization, the Church of the Creator (today called Creativity). This book, Rahowa! This Planet is All Ours! contains selected articles and editorials from issues 28 to 39 of "Racial Loyalty" and includes topics such as "Comparative Religions: Greek Orthodoxy, Protestantism, Hinduism, Nazi-Germanic religion, British Israelism, Mormonism, Atheism,"; "The Wildest Stories Ever Told Parts I, Ii, and Ii,"; "Saving our Planet;" "Clean Drinking Water" and much more
